data.text: @1MoreLatinoFT @EstebanNavia5 Horrific death of innocent humans is the same anywhere.  The heartbreak in Ukraine or the heartbreak in Mexico,  both caused by violence.  One doesn't top the other in the eyes of the victims and survivors.
@EstebanNavia5 honestly the world has its own problems whenever wherever. but all that aside, we can’t do much about it. there joke wasn’t funny either just stereotypical
@EstebanNavia5 Hold my beer? Are you stupid or Mexican?
@Josecar95799834 @EstebanNavia5 Indeed. Yesterday was awful and they sounded have crossed that line. 🙏we have to stick together in tough times ✊️💙💪🌏✌️

@breezyfbabe19 @EstebanNavia5 Never said kill fans and this stuff ain’t new to Mexico and I’m supporter of Atlas don’t you think I feel sad too don’t include all Mexicans there’s families and fans who wouldn’t cross the line and yesterday was something out of line
@Josecar95799834 @EstebanNavia5 This is just heartbreaking as a human being with compassion in my heart. In my eyes is not okay.. there's just a lot of hate in people's heart 🖤😭🌏✌️💚

@Josecar95799834 @EstebanNavia5 Respect above all and just because u call me a names and offend . That surely doesn't give me the green light to go fcking kill you! Nah, ill defense myself with words and if it gets aggressive there's always a way to stop it . At least for me I know the limits...

@Josecar95799834 @EstebanNavia5 Word it in whichever way you want.  Being a rival doesn't necessarily mean u have to kill or harm that person. Being a true Mexican && knowing about la Liga.  Mls, NFL, NBL⚾️, NBL 🏀and NHL and yrs they've been around has nothing to do with how humans act. There's still has to b

@breezyfbabe19 @EstebanNavia5 Not gonna happen these fans are passionate for there team there won’t be respect for other teams because Liga Mx is over 100 Years old and you ain’t Mexican if you don’t know the rival of the teams and yess this has gone to farr but football ⚽️ is more than being a fan
@EstebanNavia5 You're doing jokes about this???? What's wrong with you man?
